          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A vörös csontvelő</string>
            <string language="en-US">Red bone-marrow</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rotes Knochen-Mark</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Os-moelle /courgette rouge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Osso-bone-marrow vermelho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osso-zucchino rosso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κόκκινος μυελός των οστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hueso-tue'tano rojo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Csontvelő fénymikroszkópos képe - vörösvérsejt és thrombocyta képzés</string>
            <string language="en-US">Light-microscope image of the bone-marrow – creation of red blood cell and thrombocyte</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">csontvelő</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">vörösvértest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">thrombocyta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">vérképződés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">keringés</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht-Mikroskop Bild des Knochen-Marks? 
Kreation der roten Blutzelle und des thrombocyte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">image de Lumière-microscope de l'os-moelle 
/courgette ? création de globule rouge et de thrombocyte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imagem do Luz-microscópio do osso-bone-marrow? 
criação da pilha de sangue vermelha e do thrombocyte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">immagine del Luce-microscopio dello osso-zucchino?
creazione della cellula di anima rossa e del thrombocyte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνα ελαφρύς-μικροσκοπίων του μυελού των οστών; 
δημιουργία του κόκκινου κυττάρου αίματος και thrombocyte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿imagen del Luz-microscopio del hueso-tue'tano? 
creación de la célula de sangre roja y del thrombocyte</string>
          </description>
